strings.SS2_TRADER_POPUP_TEXT: Offer an item to the trader?
strings.SS2_LAMPBOSS_BODY_LORE:
LITTLE ONES, GATHER HERE TO ME. I MUST WARN YOU OF SOMETHING.

...

THE TRAVELER HAS RETURNED TO THIS REALM.

LONG AGO, I SUBDUED HIM, BANISHED HIM FROM OUR GARDEN. BUT NOW, HE THREATENS OUR HOME ONCE AGAIN.

IF YOU SEE HIM, DO NOT LISTEN TO HIM. HE WILL TRY TO SWAY YOU TO HIS SIDE, WITH PROMISES OF WARMTH AND SAFETY AND STRENGTH.

IT IS A TRAP.

ONCE HE HAS YOUR TRUST, YOU WILL BE A SLAVE TO HIS LIGHT. YOU WILL BEAR YOUR OWN CHAINS, JUST AS HE BEARS HIS OWN.

...

BUT - DO NOT WORRY. I WILL PROTECT THE GARDEN. IF HE HAS THE AUDACITY TO RETURN TO ME, THAT IS.

AS FOR YOU, LITTLE ONES, I HAVE A GIFT FOR EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU. COME CLOSER.

CLOSER NOW!

NOW, WATCH - WATCH HERE. WATCH MY HAND.

YOU ALL WILL HELP ME TEND TO THE GARDEN.
strings.SS2_LAMP_BODY_LORE:
Oh, dear. Look at you, poor thing.

You're freezing.

Here, now. You've been through so much already.

...

There we go. Your flame has reignited. That will keep you warm, for now.

Come with me. I'll introduce you to the others.

Oh? Of course there are others. It'd be cruel to be the only one of your kind, wouldn't it?

Come, now! Don't tarry. They'll share their warmth with you. Just follow me.

You'll be safe here.
strings.SS2_FAMILY_LAMP: <style=cWorldEvent>[WARNING] You encounter a profound sense of stillness..</style>
strings.SS2_RUNSHROOM_BODY_LORE:
We awoke in a panic, our tent ablaze. Our equipment a molten mass of the periodic table.

"H-hey, over there! That thing!"

It was so small, it looked like it could be a bug under our shoe, yet the mess it made... There was no other way.

"Stay here, I'm gonna go squeeze that thing to a fuckin' pulp."

I sat there and watched as my crew lept like frogs at the small fungi, unable to even graze its surface. Profanities like a siren in the air.

Our efforts were fruitless. I signaled for the crew to return to aid in the dowsing of the flames.

"Pipe down and get over here! The fire ain't dyin' by itself! The bastard's like a roach, you won't catch it!"

The damages weren't covered.
strings.SS2_MIMIC_BODY_LORE:
"Now, I'd like to see this as something of a learning experience, all things considered. Evolutionary biology has a curious place for mimicry, my friend- certain creatures seek not to be threatening or inviting by their own merit, but rather by the means of seeming to be a different thing entirely. Of course, evolution being random means that this isn't what we're dealing with-"

"It’s also not what we're dealing with because-"

"No no, let me finish. In this case we have a very fascinating example, don't we? A machine emulating another machine in such an animated way, as a means to trick us into getting close- why, it's positively Wicklerian in design, isn't it? Whoever made this thing really had a heart for it, don't you think?"

"...Dude, it just steals shit. Nothin' fancy about it."

"Nature really is beautiful, even in a place like this."

"Shut up and let’s keep moving. Ugh, god, why'd I have to get stuck with this guy?"

-Signal echoes, UES Contact Light
strings.SS2_CLAYMONGER_BODY_LORE: These are literally pets and livestock of people who fell to the tar... you monster... :c
